10000.desc: A plant used in cures that typically inhabits every area of Elgaia.
10000.name: Green Grass

10001.desc: An important medicinal plant that's highly effective for recovery.
10001.name: Blue Grass

10002.desc: A holy grass native to the grasslands in front of Lucius' Gate.
10002.name: Yellow Grass

10003.desc: An important medicinal plant that's highly effective in fortification.
10003.name: Red Grass

10004.desc: A medicinal plant brought to Elgaia through Lucius' Gate.
10004.name: Pink Grass

10006.desc: The core of the mysterious carnivorous plant known as the Queen Sipla
10006.name: Flower Core

10100.desc: The naturally molted feathers of a migratory bird called Theo.
10100.name: Theo Feather

10101.desc: Harpy Feathers said to be wholly composed of poison.
10101.name: Lynn Feather

10102.desc: Feathers of the giant Rhau that are materials for weapons and armor.
10102.name: Rhau Feather

10103.desc: The golden feathers from a Saku bird.
10103.name: Saku Feather

10104.desc: The molted feathers of the magical Yomi bird that hold a hidden power.
10104.name: Yomi Feather

10105.desc: A feather from the Hess, the mother of all birds.
10105.name: Heth Feather

10106.desc: A feather from the Musa, a bird said to be loved by the gods.
10106.name: Musa Feather

10107.desc: A feather from the Rhoa, often called the bird of good fortune.
10107.name: Rhoa Feather

10108.desc: The molted feathers of a black bird that soars among powerful monsters.
10108.name: Move Feather

10109.desc: A feather dropped from an auspicious bird in the Agni region.
10109.name: Seph Feather

10110.desc: A red wing from a butterfly that is rarely seen nowadays.
10110.name: Riff Feather

10111.desc: The feather of the ominous fighting bird, Zeta
10111.name: Zeta Feather

10112.desc: A feather from the so called "bird of calamity"
10112.name: Kuu Feather

10113.desc: A scorching fragment of Yugreia's wings
10113.name: Solid Flame

10114.desc: A blazing feather from Yugreia's wings
10114.name: Fire Feather

10117.desc: A feather of a Grylus, an extraordinarily rare species of bird found only in Menon.
10117.name: Phantom Feather

10200.desc: An anti-poison nut native to much of Elgaia and Grand Gaia.
10200.name: Don Nut

10201.desc: The nut of a perennial plant that increases aggression when eaten.
10201.name: Koka Nut

10202.desc: The nut from a perennial Bue plant, native all over Elgaia.
10202.name: Buru Nut

10203.desc: The nut of an annual plant that hightens the self-defense instinct.
10203.name: Hoku Nut

10204.desc: A ancient nut cherished by many, said to have tranquilizing powers.
10204.name: Suzu Nut

10205.desc: A supremely pungent nut from the Bara tree that can heal paralysis.
10205.name: Bara Nut

10206.desc: A very poisonous nut that grows everywhere in Grand Gaia.
10206.name: Mow Nut

10207.desc: A nut that grows on the back of Laguna Rex.
10207.name: Timber Nut

10208.desc: A rare nut that grows on the back of Laguna Rex.
10208.name: Shiny Nut

10209.desc: A nut from Meru-Meru that has an unusually hard shell.
10209.name: Meru Nut

10210.desc: A fruit from Meru-Meru that takes countless years to grow.
10210.name: Fairy Fruit

10300.desc: Drops of water that gush forth all over Elgaia and Grand Gaia.
10300.name: Green Drop

10301.desc: Drops of extremely sweet water found all over Elgaia and Grand Gaia.
10301.name: Blue Drop

10302.desc: Slight red drops from famed springs with a powerful recovery effect.
10302.name: Red Drop

10303.desc: A drop of water from Craster's Ravine, west of Elgaia.
10303.name: Gold Drop

10304.desc: Very valuable drops that are said to have fallen from the heavens.
10304.name: Purple Drop

10305.desc: A drop from the waters which flow around the temple Arlon.
10305.name: Silver Drop

10306.desc: Drops from a red fountain which gushes from around Dragon's Cape.
10306.name: Hero Blood

10307.desc: Miraculous drops said to have fallen from the eyes of a goddess.
10307.name: Angel Tear

10308.desc: Unique drops distributed by the Summoners' Council.
10308.name: Honor Drop

10309.desc: Smoky-looking drops that release a putrid gas, found among clusters of special fungi.
10309.name: Smoky Drop

10310.desc: A mysterious liquid that leaked out from the head of Van Lucy.
10310.name: Ruin Tear

10311.desc: A mysterious liquid that leaked out from the head of Van Nader.
10311.name: Wicked Tear

10312.desc: Liquid that drops from Yugreia's body
10312.name: Tragedy Drop

10400.desc: The green fossil of a great beast's claw obtainable anywhere.
10400.name: Green Claw

10401.desc: The blue fossil of a great beast's claw found in the Morgan region.
10401.name: Blue Claw

10402.desc: The red fossil of a great beast's claw found in the St. Lamia region.
10402.name: Red Claw

10403.desc: A fossil found near the Bricio Volcano in north-eastern Elgaia.
10403.name: Yellow Claw

10404.desc: A fossil of an Evil Beast Claw excavated from the Bariura Mines.
10404.name: Evil Claw

10405.desc: Unique claws distributed by the Summoners' Council.
10405.name: Honor Claw

10406.desc: A monster claw so large it canâ€™t be removed by any but the strongest of individuals.
10406.name: Giant Claw

10407.desc: A claw from a fanged demon with two massive horns.
10407.name: Demon Claw

10408.desc: The claw of a beast said to have come from the underworld.
10408.name: Hades Claw

10409.desc: The rigid claw of an extremely ferocious beast that resides in the lands of Agni.
10409.name: Brute Claw

10410.desc: A claw dyed with the blood of Reduhark.
10410.name: Dark Claw

10411.desc: A jet-black claw from one of the many arms of Mistzug.
10411.name: Daze Claw

10412.desc: A bright red claw from one of the upper arms of Mistzug.
10412.name: Lost Claw

10413.desc: A hard claw from an ice beast that can be used to climb glaciers.
10413.name: Frozen Claw

10414.desc: A white copper arm from Van Lucy infused with magic.
10414.name: Fallen Hand

10415.desc: A black iron arm from Van Nader infused with magic.
10415.name: Wicked Hand

10416.desc: The talon of a demon beast imprisoned in the underworld
10416.name: Prison Talon

10417.desc: The talon of an otherworldly beast said to have a machine-like body
10417.name: Metal Talon

10418.desc: The durable claw of a thunder beast
10418.name: Shock Claw

10420.desc: Grudkia's claw, which can easily cut through steel.
10420.name: Fiend Claw

10421.desc: A claw belonging to a creature with the ability to turn transparent.
10421.name: Light Claw

10422.desc: The claw of a massive earth dragon native to Estria.
10422.name: Hot Iron Claw

10500.desc: The easily obtainable green fossil of a great beast's fang.
10500.name: Green Fang

10501.desc: The easily obtainable blue fossil of a great beast's fang.
10501.name: Blue Fang

10502.desc: The red fossil of a great beast's fang found in the St. Lamia region.
10502.name: Red Fang

10503.desc: The yellow fossil of a great beast's fang.
10503.name: Yellow Fang

10504.desc: The fossil of an evil beasts fang, found in the ruins of Vriksha.
10504.name: Evil Fang

10505.desc: The fossil of a large fang from a legendary beast.
10505.name: Worn Fang

10506.desc: Unique fangs distributed by the Summoners' Council.
10506.name: Honor Fang

10507.desc: A fang from the king of all the long yellow haired beasts.
10507.name: Golden Fang

10508.desc: A fang from a demon locked away in a prison in the abyss.
10508.name: Crypt Fang

10509.desc: The fang of an ancient beast, rumored to have fallen from the sky.
10509.name: Sky Fang

10510.desc: A seed as sharp as a fang from the Purple Emperor flower.
10510.name: Purple Fang

10511.desc: A fang from a fire eating dragon used to chew flames.
10511.name: Blaze Fang

10512.desc: The fang of a feral beast that inhabits the Principality of Vriksha
10512.name: Pair Fang

10513.desc: A fang continuously surrounded by a bit of electricity
10513.name: Thunder Fang

10514.desc: A fang believed to belong to an invisible creature
10514.name: Phantom Fang

10515.desc: A fang used by Granomos to dig underground
10515.name: Burrow Fang

10517.desc: The ferocious fang of a dark wolf that can cut through demon flesh.
10517.name: Wolf Fang

10518.desc: A white-silver fang left by a black conqueror dragon.
10518.name: Black Dragon Fang

10600.desc: A crystal that holds the power of fire.
10600.name: Fire Eye

10601.desc: A crystal that holds the power of water.
10601.name: Water Eye

10602.desc: A crystal that holds the power of earth.
10602.name: Earth Eye

10603.desc: A crystal that holds the power of thunder.
10603.name: Thunder Eye

10604.desc: A crystal that holds the power of light.
10604.name: Light Eye

10605.desc: A crystal that holds the power of dark.
10605.name: Dark Eye

10606.desc: A crystal that sparkles based on the spiritual energy of its holder.
10606.name: Fujin's Eye

10607.desc: A mysterious golden crystal that has unknown effects and uses.
10607.name: Guardian Eye

10608.desc: A gold crystal whose effects and proper use are shrouded in mystery.
10608.name: Tidal Eye

10609.desc: A crystal with a silvery shine that holds immense magic.
10609.name: Demon Eye

10610.desc: Smoky-looking drops that release a putrid gas, found among clusters of special fungi.
10610.name: Acute Eye

10611.desc: A black crystal that can be uncovered in old battlegrounds.
10611.name: Grief Eye

10612.desc: Eyes on the back of Marian that hide strong magical powers.
10612.name: Spirit Eye

10613.desc: The jewel rumored to be the origin of Marian's power.
10613.name: Queen Jewel

10614.desc: A jewel Reduhark created from condensed darkness.
10614.name: Dark Jewel

10615.desc: A red hot jewel that was once the heart of Claudalus.
10615.name: Flame Jewel

10616.desc: A bright jewel that exists within the body of Laguna Rex.
10616.name: Shiny Jewel

10617.desc: A crystal from Van Lucy in the shape of an eyeball.
10617.name: Fallen Eye

10618.desc: A crystal from Van Nader in the shape of an eyeball.
10618.name: Wicked Eye

10619.desc: An evil eye that floats around Nalda Delia.
10619.name: Ominous Eye

10620.desc: A disastrous eye that floats around Nalda Delia.
10620.name: Disaster Eye

10621.desc: An eye within Nalda Delia's torso that hides terrible magic.
10621.name: Calamity Eye

10622.desc: A jewel rumored to be the origin of Nalda Delia's power.
10622.name: Doom Jewel

10623.desc: An eye from one of the many speckles on Mistzug's body.
10623.name: Phantom Eye

10624.desc: A jewel rumored to give Mistzug his power.
10624.name: Ghost Jewel

10625.desc: A precious stone that is particularly desired by humans.
10625.name: Zealot Eye

10626.desc: A strange crystal that shines according to how wise its holder is

10627.desc: A pearl hidden in Balmedia's tail
10627.name: Blaze Pearl

10628.desc: A jewel that develops within Grudkia's body.
10628.name: Fiend Jewel

10629.desc: A jewel created when Yugreia unleashes its true power.
10629.name: Feat Jewel

10630.desc: The crystallized eye of a demon.
10630.name: Black Eye

10631.desc: A crystal embedded in the demon Amu Yunos's staff.
10631.name: All-Seeing Eye

10634.desc: The crystalized magical energy of Heresy Demon Kalon.
10634.name: Eye of Fate

10700.desc: The light-green pelt of a common beast.
10700.name: Green Pelt

10701.desc: The blue pelt of a tough beast.
10701.name: Blue Pelt

10702.desc: A rare, red beast pelt with both high hardness and flexibility.
10702.name: Red Pelt

10705.desc: A beautifully patterned beast pelt often displayed by enthusiasts.

10706.desc: A rarely seen blue beast pelt.
10706.name: Azure Pelt

10707.desc: Unique pelts distributed by the Summoners' Council.

10708.desc: The pelt from a massive and immensely powerful beast.

10709.desc: The pelt from the king of the golden beasts.
10709.name: Yellow Pelt

10710.desc: The pelt of a silver wolf rumored to have gone extinct millennia ago.
10710.name: Silver Pelt

10711.desc: The pelt of an extremely ferocious beast that resides in the lands of Agni.
10711.name: Brute Pelt

10712.desc: A flawless black wing from Reduhark.
10712.name: Dark Pelt

10713.desc: A scorching, uncooled scale from Claudalus.
10713.name: Blaze Pelt

10714.desc: A scale of Laguna Rex that can deflect heat.
10714.name: Scaly Pelt

10715.desc: A hard green shell that covered Granomus.

10716.desc: A hard blue shell that covered Medronomus.
10716.name: Cobalt Pelt

10717.desc: A scale from a fire eating dragon that can never burn.
10717.name: Solid Pelt

10718.desc: An elastic pelt from an ice beast that is also very durable.
10718.name: Frozen Pelt

10719.desc: The pelt of a great bird called the "Beryl Bird."
10719.name: Beryl Pelt

10720.desc: The pelt of a huge beast that's resistant to the elements

10721.desc: A synthetic pelt used for incantations, exorcisms, and black magic
10721.name: Cursed Pelt

10722.desc: A pelt believed to belong to an invisible creature
10722.name: Phantom Pelt

10723.desc: The durable pelt of a thunder beast
10723.name: Shock Pelt

10725.desc: The scarlet pelt from the frontal part of Grudkia's body.
10725.name: Fiend Pelt

10726.desc: Bark from the Great Fairy Tree which has grown for countless years.
10726.name: Eternal Bark

10727.desc: A sturdy scale shed by Jirayen.
10727.name: Evil Scale

10729.desc: A vine from the mysterious carnivorous plant known as the Queen Sipla

10732.desc: The hide of a great serpent that lives in the Zamburg region.
10732.name: Serpent Hide

10801.desc: A blue bone from a giant beast.
10801.name: Blue Bone

10802.desc: A red bone from a mysterious beast.

10805.desc: A very hard material said to be the fossil of an ancient demon.
10805.name: Hard Bone

10806.desc: Unique bones distributed by the Summoners' Council.

10807.desc: A special bone said to reside within people of extraordinary magic power.

10808.desc: The bone of a beast fossilized after sitting for countless years.

10809.desc: A beautiful bone that has an eternal shine like silver.

10810.desc: The bone of a wolf that was protected by a dark goddess.

10811.desc: A thunder beast's organ that extends from its back to its belly.

10812.desc: The marrow of a wing from Reduhark.

10813.desc: The bone of a strange dotted animal from the Mirvana region.

10815.desc: A bone with some heat and sacred power residing within

10816.desc: The ancient bone of a creature discovered interred
10816.name: Ancient Bone

10820.desc: The beautiful and vibrant remnants of a Phoenix

10903.desc: A beetle that eats gold dust and stores it as gold in its body.

11000.desc: A stone that has special elemental attack powers.
11000.name: Fate Stone

11001.desc: A stone that has special elemental defense powers.
11001.name: Paladin Stone

11002.desc: An evil stone often used as a decoration by nobles.

11003.desc: A magical stone that radiates god-like energy.
11003.name: God Stone

11004.desc: A magical stone said to have the divine protection of the gods.

11005.desc: A magical stone rarely discovered in Grand Gaia.

11010.desc: An uncommon stone with no elemental powers.
